name: When a Beholder Dreams
description:
When a Beholder Dreams is a little game I made back in 2018 with Construct 2 for a multimedia course during my freshman year in college.

The objective is to collect the scrolls and make it to the end of the level. The game is fairly short, with 2 levels.

Controls:

  • W: levitate
  • A: move left
  • S: shield
  • D: move right
  • LMB: fire beam

All assets not made by me were from the public domain.

Credits:

  • Explosion animations: Luis Zuno (public domain)
  • Cave textures: Many artists (public domain)
  • Sound effects: Juhani Junkala (public domain)
  • Water dripping ambience: Public domain
